title: Department of Human Service Programs Cambridge Youth Programs
body: Our five fully-equipped youth centers include classroom space, meeting rooms, gymnasiums, kitchens and easy access to parks.  Cambridge Youth Programs (CYP) provides year-round activities for more than one thousand youth.  The centers are conveniently located in five Cambridge neighborhoods.

title: Departamento de Programas de Servicio de Programas Juveniles Cambridge Humanos
body: Nuestros cinco centros juveniles totalmente equipadas incluyen aulas, salas de reuniones, gimnasios, cocinas y fácil acceso a los parques. Cambridge Programas de Jóvenes (CYP) ofrece actividades todo el año por más de un millar de jóvenes. Los centros están ubicados en cinco barrios de Cambridge.

title: Cambridge Family Microsoccer
body: Cambridge Family Microsoccer provides 4-6 year olds to learn how to play soccer and have fun.  Children do not require prior experience; for most of the children, Microsoccer will be their first exposure to soccer and - in many cases - any organized sport.

title: Microfútbol para la Familia Cambridge
body: Microfútbol para la Familia Cambridge enseña a jugar fútbol a edades 4-6

title: Cambridge Youth Soccer
body: Cambridge Youth Soccer (CYS) provides fall and spring soccer programs for children and youth with a Kick Start, league, an In-Town league and travel teams in the Boston Area Youth Soccer League (BAYS). All children have the opportunity to play regardless of athletic skills or family income.

title: Cambridge Public Library
body: The Cambridge Public Library is designed to work as a unified system with a strong main library and six active branch libraries each tailored to the unique constituencies and needs of its immediate neighborhood.
